DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this interventional, prospective, randomized clinical trial is to evaluate the impact of the antioxidant N-acetylcysteine on oxidative stress in the first seven postoperative days and on renal function in the first three postoperative months in deceased kidney transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of N-Acetylcysteine on Oxidative Stress and Renal Function in Deceased Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: First transplant Deceased kidney transplant postoperative recovery at critical care unit illicit drug addiction psychiatric disorders
